name: @razorloaf/a11y00p-icons
description: Developer-friendly icons with accessibility and change-safe features.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsdx build --format es,cjs --entry src/index.tsx && del-cli "dist/*.development.*" "dist/*.map"
scripts.build:full: npm run generate && npm run build
scripts.build:force: npm run generate:force && npm run build
